name: pnp-find-obsolete-m365-groups
title: Finding Obsolete Microsoft 365 Groups with PowerShell
shortDescription: Understand to what extent the Microsoft 365 groups in your tenant are being used or even not.
longDescription: Like any resource within your Microsoft 365 tenant, M365 Groups can become unused over time. This routine uses PowerShell with CLI for Microsoft 365 to create a report of all M365 groups that are possibly obsolete.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.

references.name: Original article by Tony Redmond
references.description: Check out the original article on which this script is based.
